faq.q: How can I request a quote?
faq.a: Email us at contact@omnisyn.com.mx with your project overview, objectives, scope, timeline, budget range, required technologies, and company details. We’ll reply with a tailored estimate.
We partner with organizations in finance, healthcare, retail, manufacturing, education, and more—anyone who needs secure and scalable tech solutions.

faq.a: Our experts work with React, Angular, Vue, Node.js, .NET, Java, Python, Kotlin/Swift, Unity/Unreal, TensorFlow/PyTorch, and AWS/Azure/GCP.

faq.q: Can you integrate with existing systems?
faq.a: Yes. We build APIs and connectors to seamlessly bridge new applications with legacy ERPs, CRMs, and on-premise platforms.

faq.a: We implement role-based access control, encryption at rest/in transit, and comply with GDPR, HIPAA, or local privacy regulations as needed.

home.aboutText: OmniSyn Technologies is a Monterrey-based tech company specializing in cybersecurity, custom software, and information technology services. We help businesses protect their digital assets through services like penetration testing, risk assessments, and cyber defense planning. We also design tailored software solutions — including AI-powered tools — to support each client’s operational goals. At OmniSyn, we combine innovation and security to help organizations grow with confidence.
